info.description: API for UniSphere university social platform
info.title: UniSphere API

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns access and refresh tokens

get.description: Retrieves the profile information of the currently authenticated user

put.description: Update the current user's profile information
Update the current user's profile photo

delete.description: Delete the current user's profile photo

post.description: Generates a new access token using a valid refresh token
Creates a new instructor account with the provided information
Creates a new student account with the provided information

409.description: Email or student ID already exists

get.description: Get a list of all class notes with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new class note with file upload

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific class note
get.summary: Get a class note by ID

get.description: Retrieves a list of all departments

post.description: Creates a new department with the provided information

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission

get.description: Retrieves a specific department by its ID

put.description: Updates an existing department with the provided information

delete.description: Deletes an existing department by its ID

get.description: Retrieves a list of all faculties

post.description: Creates a new faculty with the provided information

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific faculty by its ID

put.description: Updates an existing faculty with new information

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission

delete.description: Deletes a faculty and its associated data

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission

get.description: Retrieves a list of all departments belonging to a specific faculty
Retrieves a list of instructors for a specific department
Get detailed profile information for the currently authenticated instructor (Requires instructor role)

403.description: Forbidden - User is not an instructor or token invalid

put.description: Update the academic title for the currently authenticated instructor (Requires instructor role)

400.description: Invalid request format or validation error (e.g., empty title)

403.description: Forbidden - User is not an instructor or token invalid

get.description: Retrieves a specific instructor by its ID
Retrieves a list of past exams with optional filtering and pagination

parameters.description: Sort field (year, term, courseCode, title, departmentName, facultyName, instructorName, createdAt, updatedAt)
parameters.name: sortBy

post.description: Creates a new past exam with the provided information

parameters.description: Term of the exam (FALL, SPRING, SUMMER)
parameters.name: term

get.description: Retrieves a specific past exam by its ID

put.description: Updates an existing past exam with the provided information

parameters.description: Term of the exam (FALL, SPRING, SUMMER)
parameters.name: term

delete.description: Deletes an existing past exam by its ID

code.description: Unique code for the department (e.g., CENG, EEE, MATH)

faculty.description: Associated faculty details (populated in some responses)

faculty_id.description: ID of the faculty this department belongs to (required)

code.description: Unique code for the faculty (e.g., ENG, SCI)

description.example: Faculty of Engineering and Natural Sciences

github_com_yigit_unisphere_internal_app_.description: Generic response structure for all API endpoints

data.description: Response payload - specific to each endpoint

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the response was generated

totalItems.description: Total number of items matching the query

message.example: Email format is invalid, school email required

totalItems.description: Total number of items matching the query

BearerAuth.description: Enter your JWT token (without Bearer prefix)
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
